query:
ALTER TABLE siteQuantityProgress 
ADD COLUMN status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
ADD COLUMN approvedBy INT,
ADD COLUMN approvedAt TIMESTAMP,
ADD COLUMN rejectionReason TEXT;
